extendedInfo.description: A naughty baby throw things down from the balcony. Help him to accurately throw feces at pedestrian heads.Press and hold the click button then release the mouse to throw feces on people.Interesting and funny game you love. After all, who does not like to adjust the unpleasant situation and then observe their continuation. That the game is limited and you need to get done all the dirty tricks.The strange thing is once again becoming a small child and do all the things that only you will go to the head. In this game you have to throw your diapers for people who will quietly pass by your balcony. At each level, you will need to get a certain number of passers-by. You can control the game play with the mouse.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Do not get it 3 or 4 ads pop up then a white screen
reviews.author: Rolita Stokes
